also-look-for-this-button-in-m-s-footer: Also, look for this button in M³'s footer:
applicationConfigurationDescription: Customize this app's behavior and appearance
are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete: Are you sure you want to delete
are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-pro: Are you sure you want to delete this profile?
are-you-using-this-app-at-a-kingdom-hall: Are you using this app at a Kingdom Hall? If so, we'll configure a few things for you right off the bat.
autoStartMusic: Play background music automatically before meetings
betaUpdates: Enable beta updates for testing purposes (Note: Do not enable this setting on the computer used to present media at the Kingdom Hall.)
clicking-it-will-allow-you-to-start-and-: Clicking it will allow you to start and stop the playback of background music. Music will start playing automatically before a meeting is scheduled to start when M³ is launched, and will also stop automatically before the meeting starts. However, background music playback will need to be manually started after the concluding prayer, using this button.
clicking-it-will-allow-you-to-temporaril: Clicking it will allow you to temporarily hide the media and yeartext, and reveal the Zoom participants underneath. Once the Zoom part is over, you can show the yeartext again using the same button.
configure-a-scene-in-obs-studio-to-captu: Configure a scene in OBS Studio to capture the media window.
configure-a-scene-in-obs-studio-to-show-: Configure a scene in OBS Studio to show a stage wide shot.
configure-the-websocket-plugin-in-obs-st: You'll need to configure the Websocket plugin in OBS Studio. The Virtual Camera plugin is also required, so make sure it's installed and configured as well.
congregationMeetingsDescription: Settings relating to your congregation and meeting schedule
coWeek: Next planned visit of the circuit overseer
coWeekExplain: Will automatically set the midweek meeting to Tuesday and skip unnecessary media for that week
does-your-kingdom-hall-use-a-program-cal: Does your Kingdom Hall use a program called OBS Studio?
doing-so-will-greatly-simplify-and-facil: Doing so will greatly simplify and facilitate sharing media during hybrid meetings.
drop-multimedia-files-here-to-add-them-t: Drop multimedia files here to add them to the list for this day.
enableMediaDisplayButton: Present media on an external monitor or in a separate window
enableMusicButton: Enable button to play background music
enter-the-port-and-password-configured-i: Enter the port and password configured in OBS Studio's Websocket plugin.
error.downloadMedia: An error occurred while downloading media. Please try again later.
error.pubNotFound: An error occurred while downloading a publication. Please try again later.
excludeFootnotes: Exclude media from footnotes in the Watchtower Study
excludeLffImages: Exclude Enjoy Life Forever images outside the Congregation Bible Study
excludeTh: Exclude all media from the th brochure
feel-free-to-browse-around-the-other-ava: Feel free to browse around the other available options, or if you prefer you can head right to the media playback screen and start using it to display media.
fileProcessError: There was an error processing this file
filetypeNotSupported: This file type is not yet supported
good-start: We're off to a good start.
hideMediaLogo: Hide logo from media presentation window
hints.jwlCompanionMode: This will not show the yeartext and the media display window will be hidden after media is played to allow JW Library to be visible on the external monitors.
in-what-language-should-media-be-downloa: In what language should media be downloaded?
integrationsDescription: Configure integration with other apps and services
jwpubNoMultimedia: The JWPUB file does not contain any multimedia
look-for-this-button-in-m-s-footer: Look for this button in M³'s footer:
m-is-now-ready-to-be-used: M³ is now ready to be used.
mediaRetrievalAndPlaybackDescription: Configure meeting media download and playback settings.
noDownloadsInProgress: No downloads are currently in progress
noMedia: There are no media items for the selected date. Use the Import media menu to add some.
notice-the-yeartext-is-now-being-display: You'll notice the yeartext is now being displayed on the external monitor! But let's keep going.
obs-studio-is-a-free-app-used-to-manage-: OBS Studio is a free app used to manage camera and video feeds in many Kingdom Halls.
obsCameraScene: Default stage view scene in OBS Studio
obsImageScene: Optional separate media scene for images
obsMediaScene: Media window scene in OBS Studio
once-the-scene-has-been-created-select-i: Once the scene has been created, select it here.
only-show-settings-that-are-not-valid: Only show settings that are not valid
pdfFilesNotSupported: PDF files are not supported yet
select-no-if-you-plan-on-using-m-to-disp: Select 'No' if you plan on using M³ to display all meeting media. This will activate fully automated meeting media retrieval, yeartext display, background music playback, and other practical features. Close JW Library before proceeding if you select 'No'!
setupWizard.intro: M³ is an app designed to make your playing media at congregation meetings easy and stress-free. Let's configure a few things, and then we'll get on our way.
sureStopVideo: Are you sure you want to stop the video?
the-name-of-your-congregation-or-group-w: The name of your congregation or group will be used to quickly switch between profiles, if ever you decide create more than one in the future.
to-add-files-from-your-computer-drag-and: To add files from your computer, drag-and-drop them directly into this window.
to-quickly-show-and-hide-zoom-participan: Tip: To ensure you're able to quickly show and hide Zoom participants on the TV screens when needed, make sure that the setting to "use dual monitors" in Zoom is enabled.
tryConfiguringFallbackLanguage: Try configuring a fallback language in the settings
use-the-slider-below-to-adjust-the-start: Use the slider below to adjust the start and end time of this media item.
videoTimeSave: Save custom start and end times
well-start-fetching-media-while-we-wrap-: We'll start fetching media while we wrap up with our initial setup.
what-are-your-meeting-days-and-times-wel: What are your meeting days and times? We'll use this info to display the media calendar.
what-language-would-you-like-m-to-be-dis: What language would you like M³ to be displayed in?
will-you-be-using-this-app-as-a-companio: Will you be using this app alongside JW Library?
would-you-like-to-integrate-m-with-obs-s: Would you like to integrate M³ with OBS Studio?
